website_summaries.verdict: A super sturdy, well-made life jacket for water-bound adventurers. The downside is the extra effort it may take to ensure you get a size that fits.
pros: A Coast Guard–approved life vest that's rated to fit
Adjustable straps include a leg strap to help keep vest in place
cons: Fits small and tight, but most people that have worn it say it's comfortable once you find the right fit

customer_reviews.title: Probably saved my wife's life
customer_reviews.text: Bought a pair of these, one for me, one for my wife. We were tubing down our local river and she was throw off by an unexpected rock/rapid and landed under it. She was stuck at that point and the only reason her head stayed above water was this vest. So, you're looking at a vest that is comfortable but can also save your life, well you're in the right place.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Dresden

customer_reviews.title: Fits a 6'2 225 lb man with a little extra room
customer_reviews.text: Ordered 3 of these due to the universal fit label. I looked everywhere to try to get a real idea of how universal these really are. I am 6'2 225lbs. 48 chest. This fit me fine with room to even size up to someone a little bigger, and yet they could be brought down to a size that my 5'0 100lb relatives could use. The open sides make these very versatile. I considered ordering the oversize for myself but I am glad that I did not. Very pleased with the versatility of these vests.
customer_reviews.author: DMax

customer_reviews.title: had fun on the lake with ease of mind
customer_reviews.text: I'm a 260 woman usually wear a size 2x in shirts and it fit me perfectly, it can be extended bigger. After much researching I decided on this life vest, held me up quiet well in water and used in a small rowing boat, had fun on the lake with ease of mind!
customer_reviews.author: AmazonFan

customer_reviews.title: Very happy
customer_reviews.text: Finally had a chance to take these life jackets out. At first I felt they sat up too high, but once we sat in the canoe they were perfect and pretty comfy. I would recommend this product to anyone looking for an affordable life jacket.
customer_reviews.author: Sparts227

customer_reviews.title: We bought 3 for use with our kayaks and while they work, the adjustable straps don't tighten very much so it's loose on the body
customer_reviews.text: We bought 3 for use with our kayaks and while they work, the adjustable straps don't tighten very much so it's loose on the body, it ends up riding pretty high once you sit because you can't tighten the straps. I am not a small woman, 5'8" and athletic and it feels too loose on me.
customer_reviews.author: Sand Box

customer_reviews.title: Check for damages before use
customer_reviews.text: ***update**** The jacket has holes at the bottom of each float that allow the water to drain. I was afraid the slits would allow water to become trapped and would weigh me down. The jacket works just fine. It’s just a shame it didn’t come with out damages. I’ve changed my rating to 4* since the product works just damaged. The back has a large slice. This vest was completely sealed in a plastic so it had to have been cut before packaging. So disappointed. I needed this vest for next day and now I guess I’ll just drown. Lol guess I have to make a pit stop at a sports store.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonAddict

customer_reviews.title: Made in China?
customer_reviews.text: It's a basic life jacket. It seems to be made well and fits every one in my household. Product advertising states product is made in USA with foreign components, but the tag says it was made in China. What else is this manufacturer lying about?
customer_reviews.author: TK.

customer_reviews.title: Too small for anyone over 120lbs ...
customer_reviews.text: Ordered big but these are small, small small small. Did I mention these are too small?!! My son is 6’ and 180lbs —ordering adult for him was a waste. The vest barely reaches down the his stomach and he can’t even buckle it. My husband, forget it. The only person who can utilize this is my daughter who’s 5’6 and 120lbs. It’s perfect on her, but the rest of us went to Costco and purchased ours there.
customer_reviews.author: I. Ski

customer_reviews.title: For those wondering if their kiddo can fit...
customer_reviews.text: We got this in adult universal. My son is about 4 ft 9 and bounces back and forth between 99 - 101 lbs. Fits him well and looks like he will be able to use it for a few summers since the straps can be adjusted.
customer_reviews.author: M.A.

customer_reviews.title: Good, durable life jacket
customer_reviews.text: It's a good life jacket. My relative can't swim at all and it kept her head above the water in a swimming pool. I'm not the best swimmer and I felt comfortable while wearing it. It says it's a universal adult size but that's probably for the size of an average man rather than a woman. It was a little big on all the women who wore it in the pool. The only thing to watch out for is accidentally tipping over if you lean too far back or too far forward. If the jacket is too loose on you, you're more likely to tip over, so definitely make sure the person wearing it can actually fit the jacket.
customer_reviews.author: Sam H.

customer_reviews.title: Can’t beat it
customer_reviews.text: You cannot beat this for the price. Got it right after getting my first kayak and this fit my budget perfectly. I am ~5’9” ~260lbs and the Universal size fit well. Very comfortable too!
customer_reviews.author: Marcos R.

customer_reviews.title: states oversized, but is exactly the same as the universal size!  States 52" chest, NO WAY!
customer_reviews.text: states oversized, but is exactly the same as the universal size! States 52" chest, NO WAY! We needed these life jackets for tomorrow and don't have time to return. I got the universal for myself 110# and the oversized for my husband 200#. You should see him in this! I held both sizes up to compare and they are identical. Afraid to return since I will probably get the same in return. We need it actually oversized how it states the size should be.
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: These life vests kept us safe after our kayak capsized!
customer_reviews.text: I bought 2 for kayaking. They appear very well constructed, are lightweight, and highly adjustable for a comfortable fit that doesn't obstruct paddling. They are very reasonably priced, especially considering their quality. A few weeks ago we capsized our rental tandem kayak. My wife, who is not a swimmer, stayed afloat due to the vest. I'm heavyset, and I was able to swim a sidestroke to keep her ashore, and I didn't need to worry about keeping myself afloat.
customer_reviews.author: Rick

customer_reviews.title: Excellent life Jacket!
customer_reviews.text: I bought two of these; one for myself (5' 3" 120 lbs) and one for my husband (5'11" 170 lbs) and we both got a good fit. I love that it is not one continuous life jacket that goes around from front to back - the sides are open and that allows for better fit, air circulation and movement. I'd definitely recommend these.
customer_reviews.author: Jill Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Good price, but not for active wear
customer_reviews.text: Solid and well-priced, these jackets are not designed for active wear: kayakers should look elsewhere. However, if you need something for folks to wear while being transported by boat to the beach or similar functions, these are fine. Note that there are only two sizes.
customer_reviews.author: Martha's Vineyard

customer_reviews.title: so small
customer_reviews.text: this item came and was supposed to be oversize... i would say oversize for a small child. the quality is eeh would not buy again
customer_reviews.author: Andy

customer_reviews.title: Standard. Nothing fancy or comfy
customer_reviews.text: This is a very standard life jacket. I believe it is worth the price as listed but do not expect this to be adequate if you are a frequent user. This is a “throw this in the boat so we have enough life jackets for everyone” life jacket. It serves its purpose and it will save a life certainly. As far as comfort and flash to wakeboard or participate in water sports you may want to look elsewhere if that is what you are seeking.
customer_reviews.author: Phillycheese

customer_reviews.title: but I'd recommend this company to create a thinner version
customer_reviews.text: These are obviously meant for safety first, but when my husband and I were kayaking with these vests they kept riding up into our chins. They do their job, but I'd recommend this company to create a thinner version.
customer_reviews.author: A.E.D.

customer_reviews.title: Good PFD
customer_reviews.text: The vest looks good and is about as comfortable as I would expect. It is pretty warm on a summer day on the river but I guess any PFD would be. I did find out that it doesn't do me a whole lot of good laying in the bottom of the canoe when the canoe gets turned over in rapid water. Luckily I survived and after that I wore it in the canoe.
customer_reviews.author: 1yrloose

customer_reviews.title: I am having trouble sizing the vet to fit me
customer_reviews.text: It is difficult "for me" to adjust the size. I haven't relly been able to size it to fit me. I have to go to Dick's Sporting Goods so they can show me. That's it so far. I'll see what happens when it's sized and I hope that I have to use it in a life-and-death situation. And if I do I really hope that it works like it's supposed to.
customer_reviews.author: Dire Straits

customer_reviews.title: Not the Stearns quality of old
customer_reviews.text: I haven't bought life jackets in years and thought I couldn't go wrong with the Stearns brand. WHat I received was flimsy and cheap. Lightweight nylon material covering cheap foam minimally held together with tiny thread.
customer_reviews.author: Kurt

customer_reviews.title: Lousy fit, rides up high on chest
customer_reviews.text: Horrible fit, rides up too high on chest when in water. Vest is not very tall only covers upper half of chest. No lower strap to go between legs, so vest rises uip to your chin.
customer_reviews.author: Carl A. Roedell

customer_reviews.title: It's a good vest but too short for an oversized person.
customer_reviews.text: The vest is strong, durable & has adjustable straps so the oversized fit my husband who is about 220 lbs comfortably since the sides are open. However, the vest only gives room in width not length so the vest was short on him and he was a little uncomfortable..I decided to keep the vest for my son because it is good quality and buy my husband a big and tall vest which is 24 inches in L and will fit more comfortably..this vest is only 20 inch long so if the person has any type of belly it will go up and look way shorter..so keep that in mind.
customer_reviews.author: VG

customer_reviews.title: Don't trust the sizing
customer_reviews.text: I'm large, long-waisted, and barrel-chested. I bought the size that should have fit, but it was way too small for my frame. Had it fit properly, I would have kept it because the quality for the dollar made it a really good value for occasional use. Then again, a life jacket that rides up over your head can't save you, so I paid twice as much for another brand that was better quality and fit just like a body glove.
customer_reviews.author: UltrasonicallyYours

customer_reviews.title: Not made for big men at all
customer_reviews.text: Well... I bought this in the largest size available for larger people, now keep in mind I’m in great shape 6’2” 245lbs but I do have wide shoulders. This thing was so short on me and very very small I’m not sure how an amazing extra large person could fit into this. Lmao. Unless it’s made for stocky little trolls.
customer_reviews.author: EngineerEagan

customer_reviews.title: We didn't end up having to use these, but ...
customer_reviews.text: We didn't end up having to use these, but they fit right. I got the regular size for me and the larger one for my mom. I tested it in the pool and it didn't seem to make me lean back or forward. I got them as a precaution for swimming with my mom as she is slightly overweight and has a disability and I didn't want us to be stressed if the waters were wavy, but there were no waves so we never used them.
customer_reviews.author: amazonbear

customer_reviews.title: Nice but pretty long
customer_reviews.text: I'm fairly tall (5'9") but have a pretty small torso. The vest does sit up a little high. I use it mainly for kayaking, and when I get down in the vessel, there's a decent amount of vest that comes back up at my neck/chest. My torso isn't full, but is long, so I would caution anyone who is shorter/has a small frame to look at another vest. Seems durable and has a nice presentation.
customer_reviews.author: Emily Schuler

customer_reviews.title: Happy with this
customer_reviews.text: After a season of sailing with this vest, I give it a thumbs up. Well made. Bulkier than the gas-cartridge vests, but you don't have to worry if the gas cartridge still works if you need it. Get it oversized so you can wear a warm coat underneath when in cold, windy weather.
customer_reviews.author: Tom

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: I was surprised how nice these were for the price. I was afraid they would feel uncomfortable and touch but it’s actually very comfortable! Doesn’t hit my chin like others have described. I’m 5,1” 105, obviously I tightened it all the way, but it fits! My partner is 5’4” 130lbs and also fits too!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointing
customer_reviews.text: I received this oversized life jacket today and very disappointed..i am a 56 inch chest and i couldn't even out it on.. very small and not true to size and was sort on the front of it.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff B

customer_reviews.title: A rider
customer_reviews.text: When I get into the water the pads ends up on my neck;I tried tightening the bottom straps but do no good.I am a female 150 pounds don’t have a big belly and fits great out the water;always have to pull it down.Did not return because I got rid of the packing.Really disappointing learning to swim and having a jacket that looks good but that’s it.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Dudley

customer_reviews.title: Affordable, comfortable, and recommend
customer_reviews.text: Good price. Nice fit. They will fit both my mother (small build) and my father (larger build). Purchased 2 and im not disappointed with my buy. Safety for a great price. If you need a life jacket for a time oit on the water pick one of these up. 5 stars
customer_reviews.author: Anthony C

customer_reviews.title: Not as easy to spot as the orange ones
customer_reviews.text: I haven't tested to see if this thing will save my life or not. I do float when wearing it, so that's a good sign. In hindsight, I should have gotten the orange colored one, they are easier to spot off in the distance than the purple ones... Maybe I'll spray paint it orange!
customer_reviews.author: Peter Filippone

customer_reviews.title: A little snug
customer_reviews.text: I bought this life vest for kayak fishing. I'm a fairly big guy, and I usually go 2XL on the sizing to ensure it fits. This vest as a 2XL is a little snug. But it works. Very comfortable. No binding or rashes. I generally don't even notice I'm wearing it. I like it. If you're not sure about the sizing, go one size bigger.
customer_reviews.author: JD Rocker

customer_reviews.title: Great deal on a life jacket!
customer_reviews.text: Thankfully I've never been in a situation to fully test this lifejacket, it just sits on the front of my paddle board. But it's legit and I'm confident if I ever needed to float in water that this life jacket would do the job well!
customer_reviews.author: Chris Fellure

customer_reviews.title: Great average size to small adult life jacket.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the same size for my husband and I and we are close in size. He's 5'8" and 170lbs and I'm 5'6" and about 140 for us both nicely. However my mother also used it and she is quite a big bigger and it seemed quite small on her. We live in SK and heRe you are required to wear life jackets at the water park these were the right price and perfect to meet the requirement.
customer_reviews.author: Mario Sottosanti

customer_reviews.title: Fits tall people too
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my husband for kayaking. He is 6'4 and slim. It fits just fine and does the job. It isn't really good for plus size women as the clips over the chest don't stretch enough. Just an FYI if that is what you need.
customer_reviews.author: Esther

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking
customer_reviews.text: I have not used them in the water yet. The vest is easy to adjust and fits perfectly. The vest color says blue but the picture looks more purple, so I was pleasantly surprised to get a bright blue vest.
customer_reviews.author: M K

customer_reviews.title: Quality Adult Life Vest
customer_reviews.text: I like the light weight & comfortable feeling & versatile adjustments that this life vest provides. I use it for being out on the water while doing boating types of activities - kayaking; canoeing; boating; jet skiing; paddle boating, etc. I am pleased that I purchased this & recommend this vest.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Basic PFD/adjustable straps for width
customer_reviews.text: I just need a no-frills PFD for a kayaking, and this serves the purpose. It’s standard jacket with adjustable straps for width. Length is okay for an average height, medium frame adult or teen.
customer_reviews.author: Margaret R. Beardsley

customer_reviews.title: Worth it and gets the job done
customer_reviews.text: Lightweight, worth the price. If I had paid $50, I'd be leaving a different review. But, for the price, this is a great buy. It's not bulky but is comfortable and gets the job done
customer_reviews.author: Brian Coleman

customer_reviews.title: Does not fit as described
customer_reviews.text: Item was descibed as oversized, however, my husband is 6'0 a d 225 and the c'est was too small.... through the shoulders and through the stomach areas...in no way is this oversized.
customer_reviews.author: Anita Logan

customer_reviews.title: They seem to be well made, but won't fit larger people.
customer_reviews.text: I returned them as they did not fit larger people. You can open the straps all the way but the floatation material does not fit right. Get one that is 3x or 4x.
customer_reviews.author: Uncle Flapjack

customer_reviews.title: Won’t stay in place
customer_reviews.text: Regretted purchasing as when in the water it won’t stay down. Bought larger life jackets for family and liked the price but should of spent the extra for enclosed sides. It will do the job but family opted to use others that won’t ride up around their necks.
customer_reviews.author: cef

customer_reviews.title: It's not oversized.
customer_reviews.text: It's too late to return this by the time I've tried it on. It's way too small. Can't believe this is advertised as oversized. That's why I bought it in the first place.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Runs really small great product.
customer_reviews.text: Runs really small. This is a kids size or a super small adult. Great vest just be sure of size when ordering. I already had in so I knew this would fit my 8year old daughter.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Shocked at all the positive reviews. Pitifully small for large adults and size chart is way off
customer_reviews.text: If you're looking for a large vest for large adults (xl, xxl, xxxl, etc) don't waste your time looking at this. This thing really is not worth it. I cannot believe the amount of positive reviews. It's one of the reasons why I purchased it. What a letdown.
customer_reviews.author: CDM

customer_reviews.title: “Universal” size is way too big for XL guy
customer_reviews.text: “Universal” size was too big for me, so I bought an XL lifejacket and won’t use this one again. I used this vest for a week long trip to lake powell and was underwhelmed. It was too big and keep riding up, which is a safety problem...
customer_reviews.author: Stephen Smith

customer_reviews.title: Universal for all - adjust the straps for fit.
customer_reviews.text: Get universal unless you are actually obese. Not to make anyone feel bad.. We ordered these for 3 adults and 1 teen. All can wear comfortably. You need to undo the straps on the sides ( they are looped into the vest) to adjust properly. Adult 1: 220lbs, 5'9. Adult: 170lbs. 5'4. Adult 3: 160lbs 5'2. Teen 130lbs. 5'6. The vest sits well ( make sure you actually read how to fit it, and how it should sit for it to actually be effective)
customer_reviews.author: optimuslime49

customer_reviews.title: Good fit and finish
customer_reviews.text: Easy arm movements and can handle lines, winches, all the kinds of arm motions required on a sailboat. I like that it shows up well in photos. More importantly it shows up well in the drink.
customer_reviews.author: Harbor Square

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price
customer_reviews.text: It's a great for the price. I took it out in Huntsville State Park where the water was very calm. I'm not an expert kayaker, I've only been on calm water and this was a great alternative to having to rent one. I'd read reviews about the paddle not being great but for my level it worked fine.
customer_reviews.author: corina

customer_reviews.title: Not for ladies with a bust
customer_reviews.text: This should have been advertised as a man’s vest. If you have any type of bust, it really sticks out and looks funny. I kept it though and my husband can use it.
customer_reviews.author: jewelry29

customer_reviews.title: Very nice PFD.
customer_reviews.text: Very nice Type III adult life jacket. Comfortable and easily adjusted to fit nearly any adult. Great price, and expedient shipping.
customer_reviews.author: poptu

customer_reviews.title: Too short!
customer_reviews.text: This has great room in width but looks like a crop top!! It's so short and the strap at the top comes right under the armpit very uncomfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Juliana

customer_reviews.title: POOR QUALITY & CHEMICAL SMELL
customer_reviews.text: This product is NOT approved as a Emergency Flotation Device it is so cheaply made and the chemical smell is terrible! I can only imagine what the mark-up is given it’s MADE IN CHINA. 👎🏼
customer_reviews.author: HitmySoul

customer_reviews.title: Small size
customer_reviews.text: I’m not a huge man, but this doesn’t come close to fitting me. I would term it “small “ or “medium”, and definitely not “universal.
customer_reviews.author: Gregory

customer_reviews.title: To small for large adult.
customer_reviews.text: This vest was advertised as oversized adult. No way I am 6'3 and weight 215 , I could barely get it on and could not comfortably buckle it.
customer_reviews.author: JJ JR

customer_reviews.title: Easy to adjust the size great quality cheap price
customer_reviews.text: I got these to go with our inflatable kayak & they are simple and but work perfectly I got a size large for me (145 lbs) XL for my Husband (225 lbs) adjusts nicely. Cheap price...
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Turner

customer_reviews.title: Not universal size
customer_reviews.text: I'm 5'2 and 140lbs and this just barely fit me and wont expand anymore. I just want something basic and inexpensive and this fits that but it should definitely not be advertised as universal size.
customer_reviews.author: IDALIE FREEMAN

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for a teen
customer_reviews.text: It’s perfect for my 5’11 160pound 15 year old!!! It fits him just right. Very excited to go canoeing with the new life life jacket
customer_reviews.author: Zeicha

customer_reviews.title: Good deal
customer_reviews.text: I love how they adjust for the larger sizes. I bought these for the great reviews. I will update once I actually use them.
customer_reviews.author: Kristan K

customer_reviews.title: Cheap all around
customer_reviews.text: Very cheap materials and not very comfortable for me, but suitable to ride on my kayak to meet the requirement. I recommend going with another option of looking for long period comfort.
customer_reviews.author: MICHELLE

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for kayaking
customer_reviews.text: I bought this jacket to use while kayaking. I'm 5'10, 217 lbs and it fits great, open on the sides for paddling, very light weight and very comfortable
customer_reviews.author: Moodyblue

customer_reviews.title: Great little jacket for this purpose
customer_reviews.text: I am using this to kayak in very calm water... Great little jacket for this purpose. I would have given five stars but I read that if you were to be unconscious, it wouldn't keep your head out of the water. I would recommend it for low impact water sport.
customer_reviews.author: Marianne

customer_reviews.title: Fit perfect
customer_reviews.text: These vests fit me and my husband as expected. We aren’t very big people, fit comfortably. I would say these fit small and medium sized adults, go with the oversized if you are a larger person.
customer_reviews.author: Cristy Williams

customer_reviews.title: Adjusts fairly easily, only complaint is if you are on the ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought this life vest for recreational kayaking. Adjusts fairly easily, only complaint is if you are on the smaller size the vest is a bit cumbersome. Will do the job to keep me safe in the event of the kayak collapsing. My measurements 5'8 125 lbs 32.5" bust 26" waist
customer_reviews.author: Dee C

customer_reviews.title: Good material
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my husband and it fits him perfect. He is 6 feet all and weighs 145, he is slim and very athletic. Fits perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Naty

customer_reviews.title: Big Girl Looking Good
customer_reviews.text: I always worry that standard safety gear won't fit me well so I make a point of shopping around. This vest is a good price and fit me like a charm (I wear a Women's US Size 28/30) and the vest is adjustable enough that my friends of various sizes were also able to use it comfortably. I also like the cut around the arms, it made it very comfortable and easy to paddle.
customer_reviews.author: the notorious e

customer_reviews.title: just what i had hoped for
customer_reviews.text: once I figured out how to adjust the size I was very pleased. fits well prompt delivery, nice vest.
customer_reviews.author: ned j. augustyniak

customer_reviews.title: Kinda cheap
customer_reviews.text: Kinda cheap but it wasn’t expensive. I keep it in our boat in case if emergencies so it serves its purpose.
customer_reviews.author: Halie Bidwell

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I am sending this back. It looks good and quality seems good but the clasps are so hard to open. I even got my finger stuck and severely pinched trying to open it while testing it. Disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Sasha Parker

customer_reviews.title: Fits just right
customer_reviews.text: bought this for my husband to go canoeing and it fits him just right, very reasonable for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Zeicha

customer_reviews.title: Fits as expected
customer_reviews.text: We use this for kayaking. Fits well, don't know if it works, luckily have not needed to use it
customer_reviews.author: CHA

customer_reviews.title: Great Fit and Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Works great without being cumbersome. Fits as expected and does not get too hot when out on the water in a boat. Not bulky along the torso so as not to interfere with rowing action.
customer_reviews.author: msteach

customer_reviews.title: Great for my kids!
customer_reviews.text: I bought two of these to use for my kiddos on our trip to the beach. It fit my daughter perfectly (she’s between 110-120lbs)! It fit my son well enough to use, but was slightly big on him (he’s about 94lbs). They worked great and are easy to adjust!
customer_reviews.author: Startop

customer_reviews.title: Works For Us !
customer_reviews.text: We bought these vests for lake fishing on sunny days. After showing them to a coast guard member, he said "great for that purpose" which works for us. We're strong swimmers, keep to sunny days on lakes for fishing, and have a variety of other safety gear (flares, water protected mobile phones, life rafts roped to the boat), etc. For salt water fishing...would go industrial and take the coast guard persons advise: the kind of neck vest/preserver you yank the cord and it inflates: he prefers folks in those and again - we'll take that advise and keep piling on the safety gear. Husband is 6foot 2, 200 pounds and these fit him great.
customer_reviews.author: La Conner Wanderer

customer_reviews.title: Would not recommend.
customer_reviews.text: Would not recommend this for anyone with a long torso. The straps would not stay down around my waist and the entire life jacket cam up over my head when I was in the water. The straps were tightened appropriately, and it was fine as long as i was on the boat, but does not work for when you are in the water.
customer_reviews.author: Susan N

customer_reviews.title: Good value for the price
customer_reviews.text: Use it for kayaking, good value for the price. Runs VERY SMALL though, had to return it initally and get a larger size up.
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: Great quality!
customer_reviews.text: Great quality! And fits great for 6’3” husband and myself 5’6”. They are plenty adjustable
customer_reviews.author: Rebz

customer_reviews.title: We have a pool
customer_reviews.text: While this is an adult size...you would be surprised how my use it gets in our pool
customer_reviews.author: cwam

customer_reviews.title: Great for a Man
customer_reviews.text: I was worried it wouldn't fit my husband, who wears and XL, but it does.
customer_reviews.author: Michele Elliott

customer_reviews.title: Fits our needs
customer_reviews.text: Fits our needs. I wanted inexpensive life vests for when we go kayaking. We've used them with our inflatable kayaks on still water. If I were going out on a boat I'd look for something specifically geared toward that but this is fine for us.
customer_reviews.author: Shutterbug

customer_reviews.title: It Fits
customer_reviews.text: I just got it so I don't know anything else about it. It came on time, looks good and it fits.
customer_reviews.author: Wonka

customer_reviews.title: Fits big, but not long enough
customer_reviews.text: Good product, good material and stitching. Just not long enough, stios before belly button, so it looks kinda stupid! Lol
customer_reviews.author: LAW

customer_reviews.title: Nice but not for kayaking
customer_reviews.text: This is pretty good but not what I was looking for. Are used it for kayaking and it was too bulky for that activity.
customer_reviews.author: Suki

customer_reviews.title: Size smaller that specified
customer_reviews.text: The size does match what was specified. I measured my child be purchasing to make sure it would fit and it does not even come close. To top it off I can not return it. Does anybody want a brand new (never been used) life jacket for a SMALL child?
customer_reviews.author: Bill Webster

customer_reviews.title: It looked used rather than new. Had dust or beach sand on it
customer_reviews.text: It did floated well. But is was a bit tight and it looked used rather than new. It had dust or beach sand on it.
customer_reviews.author: Sharlene LA

customer_reviews.title: Great Life Jacket
customer_reviews.text: Great little life jacket! We live on a pond so we needed several of them.
customer_reviews.author: Sam

customer_reviews.title: Buy this one - it will last
customer_reviews.text: Nothing to dislike about this product. I am confident that this will be the first and last vest - no need to look any further. Very good.
customer_reviews.author: hamr

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for the casual, occasional waterbug
customer_reviews.text: We don't boat much, but a family reunion made a life vest purchase mandatory. These shipped really fast, and we spent all day on a large lake and the vests, while just a wee bit stiff, were comfortable the whole time. The kids got in the water with them and said they were great.
customer_reviews.author: NebraskaGreen

customer_reviews.title: It fit
customer_reviews.text: Most lifejackets are so small, but this one was perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Chase Brooks

customer_reviews.title: Ok, but smaller than expected
customer_reviews.text: Have worn only once, not gotten wet. I expected it to be bigger.
customer_reviews.author: Gregory

customer_reviews.title: Great bargain, fit well
customer_reviews.text: Got two of these, one for my girlfriend and one for myself. They both fit us perfectly without needing to adjust anything out of the box. Came nicely packaged and worked out well for our first kayaking trip with an Intex Explorer K2!
customer_reviews.author: Nic

customer_reviews.title: Fits perfectly!
customer_reviews.text: I'm pretty big and wasn't too sure whether this would fit, but it fits easily! It is comfortable and not too suffocating! Great value for the price!
customer_reviews.author: Cahmbriel A. Clackum

customer_reviews.title: Both sizes appear to be the same
customer_reviews.text: I ordered two vest. One regular and one oversized. Comparing the two they are the same size. Maybe the straps are longer on the oversized? Either way, they appear to be just fine as far as quality for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Brian M

customer_reviews.title: Feels Safe but didnt do the job.
customer_reviews.text: It says this can hold up to 300 lbs so i bought it. Didnt float at all when used in saltwater.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Mari

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: Haven't used these yet that they seem to be a good quality. After I use them all put on another review.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Universal size? Are you kidding me? I ordered ...
customer_reviews.text: Universal size? Are you kidding me? I ordered 2 vests, one for me and one for the wife. The wife's fit perfectly, mine didn't even come close, no matter how much the straps were adjusted. She's 5' - 108 lbs. I'm 6' - 232 lbs. Sent the Stearns back and ordered a Body Glove in a large size.
customer_reviews.author: OzRvLife

customer_reviews.title: A little small!
customer_reviews.text: My girlfriend can fit in it alright. I fit into a large size shirt comfortably, and I can only fasten one or two buckles. Kinda disappointed, but the material is good quality. If you’re a medium size or small sized shirt wearing individual, it should work great for you.
customer_reviews.author: Bob Dolemite

customer_reviews.title: So happy
customer_reviews.text: The vest fit my husband perfectly and will be great for kayaking.
customer_reviews.author: tammie varieur

product_meta.title: Stearns Adult Classic Series Vest
product_meta.description: Enjoy a comfortable day on the boat in a Stearns Adult Classic Series Vest. The US Coast Guard-approved PFD is designed with three adjustable chest belts that help make a day on the water a comfortable one. With webbed 1-in. straps, a durable nylon shell and PE foam inside, this life jacket is sure to be on the boat with you season after season. An all-purpose polyester vest for boating, tubing or swimming
feature_bullets: Great for a day on the boat or beach and in the pool or lake
For use on a boat, a personal watercraft or for tow sports
